benchmark_details.name: MCPDial (Minecraft Persona-driven Dialogue dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: MCPDial is a persona-driven dialogue dataset for Minecraft that includes complex human-written player and NPC personas and conversations, incorporating natural language utterances as well as canonical function calls representing game APIs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To serve as a valuable resource for training and evaluating conversational agents within the Minecraft domain.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: One limitation of our dataset is the relatively small number (49) of human-written conversations, which may impact the diversity and coverage of various conversation topics.

data.size: 250 NPC personas, 750 player personas, 49 human-written conversations and 220 automatically-generated conversations.
data.annotation: Expert-generated and LLM-generated with a review process.

methodology.calculation: Average ratings from expert annotators on a scale of 1 to 5.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better quality that aligns with the characteristics of the provided personas and appropriate function calls.
methodology.validation: Human evaluation confirmed high-quality conversations in terms of various criteria.

harm: Potential generation of biased or offensive content.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The authors ensured the absence of sensitive information and offensive content.
